title: ICC T20 World Cup 2026 schedule: Dates, fixtures, groups and full list of matches for T20 WC in India | Cricket News
text: KEY TAKEAWAYS: - ICC have announced the schedule for the upcoming T20 World Cup 2026. - India and Sri Lanka will co-host the global competition. - Arch-rivals India and Pakistan once again clubbed in the same group. - Scotland replaced Bangladesh in the tournament after the latter refused to play their matches in India due to security concerns. ICC T20 World Cup groups and schedule announced The countdown has begun for the upcoming edition of the T20 World Cup, which will be co-hosted by Asian giants India and Sri Lanka. Reigning champions India have been clubbed in Group A, alongside rivals Pakistan, Namibia, the Netherlands and the United States. Italy are all set to make their debut in the competition after qualifying for the T20 World Cup. They are placed in Group C, alongside England and the West Indies. Bangladesh was initially drawn in Group C, alongside Italy, West Indies, Nepal and England but after they refused to travel to India for the competition, they were replaced by Scotland at the last moment. MORE: All cricket news Format of the T20 World Cup 2026 Twenty teams have been divided into four groups, with each group consisting of five teams. The top two sides from each group will qualify for the Super 8s after the round-robin stage. The eight qualifying teams will be divided into two groups, where each team will face the others. The top two teams from each group will advance to the semifinals. Start date of the T20 World Cup 2026 The T20 World Cup 2026, co-hosted by India and Sri Lanka will kick off on February 7 with a double header: Pakistan vs. the Netherlands in Colombo, followed by India vs. the USA in Mumbai.
